Description:
Detects Bitsadmin connections to domains with uncommon TLDs

Author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems), Tim Shelton
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Bitsadmin to Uncommon TLD
Query: c-useragent="Microsoft BITS/*" NOT (cs-host="*.com" OR cs-host="*.net" OR cs-host="*.org" OR cs-host="*.scdn.co" OR cs-host="*.sfx.ms")
